line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Checks notoriety changes and applies dynamic changes depending on relationship with other races.
* 0: version, 1: activated, 2: pageID, 3: debug, 4: races, 5: notorieties, 6: sectors to fix
* ignore $i = 0 because we assume player is at index 0 in races array
* only multiples of 5 are allowed they say

sval.val: DESCRIPTION: Checks notoriety changes and applies dynamic changes depending on relationship with other races.
0: version, 1: activated, 2: pageID, 3: debug, 4: races, 5: notorieties, 6: sectors to fix
ignore $i = 0 because we assume player is at index 0 in races array
only multiples of 5 are allowed they say
